---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
ratings <- (sample(10, size = 10000, replace = TRUE))

df <- data.frame(matrix(unlist(ratings), nrow = 100, byrow=TRUE))
for (i in 6:10){
 df[df==i] <- NA 
}
users <- colnames(df)
items <- row.names(df)
users.bias <- c()
items.bias <- c()
for (i in 1:length(users)){
  users.bias[i] <- mean(df[,i], na.rm=TRUE)
}
users.bias


for (i in 1:length(items)){
  items.bias[i] <- mean(df[i,], na.rm=TRUE)
}
items.bias
```
